Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the New York state energy and research development authority inspect and certify solar energy systems as fire safe
Summary: Requires the New York state energy and research development authority inspect and certify solar energy systems as fire safe and that the results of such inspection are provided to the public.
LawCode: Add ยง1885, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the New York state energy research and development authority inspect and certify solar energy systems as fire safe
